creator: ari.suutari@syncrontech.com
text:
Jk2 connector is very slow (processing of each request takes 
seconds) when using it in environment which has multiple NT domains. 
I suspect that reason for this is LookupAccountSid call in 
jk_service_iis.c, which is used to get names of user's groups. 
 
The code is always trying to retrieve the group names, although 
they might never be used. There should be an option to disable this 
behaviour.

creator: nacho@apache.org
text: Thanks for reporting, fixed in CVS..
